item.content:encoded: Image: aaladin66, Pony, Sky, AestheticSpartan Don‚Äôt think, just click What‚Äôs a banana worth? A diamond banana may be worth $70 or $165, depending on the day. The gentleman banana ‚Äî a banana with a hat and dress shoes ‚Äî is less than a dollar. The pickle banana, which is a banana-shaped pickle, is roughly $40. There‚Äôs even a banana, the golden, shiny banana, that sold for more than $1,000. But most bananas, regardless of their looks, are worth just pennies ‚Äî even the banana made of dark matter. ...
